title: Katseye Faces Online Harassment After Grammy Nomination
summary: Katseye, an international girl group that earned a Grammy nomination for best new act, has reported receiving thousands of death threats through online platforms. The band members described the experience as jarring and disturbing, highlighting the severe impact of cyberbullying and hatred in the entertainment industry. This situation brings attention to the darker side of fame, where artists can become targets of intense negativity. The article likely aims to inform the public about the challenges faced by celebrities and to spark discussions on improving online safety. It serves as a reminder of the importance of mental health support for public figures and the need for stronger measures against digital harassment. By sharing their story, Katseye hopes to advocate for a more respectful and secure environment for all artists.
